snippet.title: Abandon Ship: Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Releasing on Steam Early Access on Wednesday the 21st February.

Add Abandon Ship to your Steam Wishlist here ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/551860

FOLLOW US:
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://abandonshipgame.com/ 
TWITTER ►  https://twitter.com/GameAbandonShip
FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/AbandonShipTheGame/
YouTube ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6FGX1jCxMUqdlB_d6KsztQ

Subscribe to our Newsletter and get your name in the game! See http://abandonshipgame.com/ for details.
